node.statement: DEFINITIONS. Let P_n denote the set of monic real-rooted polynomials of degree n with simple roots. For p in P_n with roots lambda_1 < ... < lambda_n, define: (i) Cauchy transform G_p(z) = (1/n) p'(z)/p(z) = (1/n) sum_{i=1}^n 1/(z - lambda_i). (ii) Discrete Hilbert transform H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j != i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j) = p'(lambda_i)/(2 p'(lambda_i)). (iii) Finite free Fisher information Phi_n(p) = sum_{i=1}^n H_p(lambda_i)^2. (iv) Finite free additive convolution r = p boxplus_n q defined by c_k = sum_{i+j=k} [(n-i)!(n-j)!/(n!(n-k)!)] a_i b_j on coefficients.
